about_the_game:
Your GOD has forsaken you, raining the fury of the heaven realm upon your very feet. Turning fellow friends to foes, for domination in the demon realm. Play as one of the 7 deadly sins in this fast paced Action Roguelike to kill god.

Precision Based Combat

Partake in violently fast paced combat that tests your ability to parry and dodge enemy attacks. Break your enemies' defenses with relentless attacks to further crush their souls. Fight in unique modes that allow you to unlock Side characters with slightly different move-sets, or a boss only mode. Each mode allows you to play against the clock to see how well you've done.

Challenging Bosses

Take on angels, demons, spirits, and nightmares as everyone against you fights for your flesh and bones. Each enemy testing you on your path. Be wary of devastating enemy combos, and their potential mix-ups.

Hit Even Harder

Use modifiers bestowed upon you by the sin of Greed to crush your foes even more efficiently. Different modifiers allow you to specialize in different areas, letting you craft completely different playstyles.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes some skimpy outfits and mature body physics.

short_description: Harder is an action rogue-like game with combat heavily inspired by the hack and slash genre. Progress through a series of enemies and bosses to reach your one true goal. Dodge, dash, parry, and slash your way through angels and demons alike in this quest to kill GOD.
